```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# Read data
df <- read_csv("output/output.csv")
```


```{r}
# Count number of known and unknown codes for each coding system
df %>%
  group_by(coding_system, code_unknown)  %>%
  summarise(count = n(),
            min_num = min(num),
            max_num = max(num),
            min_date = min(month),
            max_date = max(month))
```
